question.questionText: I forget my password, how to reset it?
question.answer: Go to the login page, click on forgot password link and follow the procedure to reset it.

question.questionText: Why are my uploaded documents are not visible?
question.answer: After uploading the documents it will take some time for them to show up. Please wait for few minutes.
Please check your internet connectivity or if you are using VPN or other services. If still problem persists, contact us at support@eca.com

question.questionText: Filled wrong details while filling exam form?

question.answer: Log in -> Fill exam form -> Wait for approval -> Download button will appear
